subtitle: Curry powder, cayenne, Worcestershire sauce and anchovies add wonderful flavour to dressed crab.

method.text: Remove the flesh from the crab shells. Wash the shells in cold water. Dry well.
Blend the light and dark crab meat together. Chop enough anchovy fillets to make 30 ml. Mix with the crab meat, curry powder, cayenne pepper and Worcestershire sauce.
Heat the butter in a frying pan. Add the breadcrumbs. Cook gently for 1 min until crispy and golden brown.
Add a third of the crisp breadcrumbs to the crab mixture. Spoon the mixture back into the shells. Top with the remaining breadcrumbs.
Cook in the oven for 15 min until piping hot and golden brown.
Garnish with strips of anchovy fillets and a leaf of fresh parsley.

title: Devilled crab
